alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:32AM EST until January 17 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 8 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Damage to trees and power lines is possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
